title: Safe Skateboarding
creator_credit: Billy Emmerson, Robert Springer and American Educational Films
brief_description: Outlines safety procedures and regulations regarding skateboard use. Includes information on maintenance of the board, riding techniques and protective clothing. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
